name: Swap tycoon
description:
Swap or slide tiles on board. Try to do it lines of three or more block with same numbers. Tiles are merged and number of block will be increase!

Swap tycoon is casual challenging puzzle game.

How to play:
You can make swap or slide tiles. Your goal is made line (horizontal or vertical) three or 4 tiles with same number. Is Swap tycoon you can make many different combos.

Swap tycoon gameplay sounds simple but requires a lot of thinking. Be a tycoon with this endless challenge!
